mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs(num, userId, subject, content, saveFilename, originalFilename, hitCount, created) VALUES(bbs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM bbs b
JOIN member1 m ON b.userId = m.userId

SELECT num, userName, subject, saveFilename, originalFilename, hitCount, TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m ON b.userId=m.userId
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT num, b.userId, userName, subject, content, saveFilename, originalFilename, hitCount, created FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m ON b.userId=m.userId WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE bbs SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT num,subject FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m ON b.userId = m.userId
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT num,subject FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m ON b.userId = m.userId
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
